info.title: Schema of Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid via Azure Resource Notifications
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

CreatedOrUpdatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.Resources.CreatedOrUpdated event.

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource payload

id.description: id of the base resource which is being created or updated

name.description: name of the resource being created or updated

type.description: the type of the resource being created or updated

location.description: the location of the resource being created or updated

tags.description: tags on the resource being created or updated

DeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.Resources.Deleted event.

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource payload

ResourceInfoAboutDeletedEvent.description: Resource information related to resource being deleted. Resource properties bag not present

id.description: id of the base resource which is being deleted

name.description: name of the resource being deleted

type.description: the type of the resource being deleted

location.description: the location of the resource being deleted

tags.description: tags on the resource being deleted
